actions.committee: Senate Committee on District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to amend the District of Columbia Code to revise and modernize procedure relating to the administration and distribution of decedents' estates and for the proof of wills.
short_title: District of Columbia Probate and Administration and Decedents' Estates Act

summary.text: District of Columbia Probate and Administration and Decedents' Estates Act - Revises, under the District of Columbia Code, the procedures relating to the administration and distribution of decedents' estates and the proof of wills. Sets forth provisions governing: (1) opening the estate; (2) personal representatives; (3) administration of the estate; (4) creditors' claims; and (5) closing the estate.

titles.title: District of Columbia Probate and Administration and Decedents' Estates Act
A bill to amend the District of Columbia Code to revise and modernize procedure relating to the administration and distribution of decedents' estates and for the proof of wills.
